title: Downloading new client is slooooooow
body:
As the title says. Took me 40 minutes to reach 19%. I searched these forums for an answer, but it seems a lot of people are having the same issue.

I restarted the download in Admin mode, but it just went back to the beginning, same DL speed of about 100kbs or less.

- I have tried restarting the computer.
- I have all appropriate permissions.
- I attempted disabling most running programs, even Windows Defender.
- I am running Windows 10. My wireless speed is around normally around 50mbs.

None of these changes have fixed the download issue.

Edit: Also tried disabling the Peer-to-Peer option, still bad.

replies.body:
I've seen a lot of players resolve this issue by completely shutting down any sort of Firewall or Antivirus program, then running the client as admin, like you mentioned. Note that *gaming mode* or any other operating mode other than *completely shutdown* will not work here.

Let me know if this worked.
